Package ie.gmit.sw.query

Class QueryFile

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.sw.query.QueryFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Query
public class QueryFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query
Object that creates a query file that can then be parsed by a QueryParser.
See Also:
Query

    • getQueryString

      public java.lang.String getQueryString() throws java.io.IOException
      Read the file and gets the text that is to be parsed. The parsable text will be at most the first 400 characters of the file, excluding any extra whitespace.
      Specified by:
      getQueryString in interface Query
      Returns:
      The part of the file that will be parsed
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs reading from the file
